title: Want to use Windows 11 on the Microsoft Surface Duo? It’s getting there
content:
The original Microsoft Surface Duo shipped with Android 10 out of the box, and the phone’s software experience was famously buggy. Nevertheless, some users managed to get enjoyment out of it, and we’ve seen the advent of a successor in the form of the Microsoft Surface Duo 2. It’s still an Android-based device though, with

The post Want to use Windows 11 on the Microsoft Surface Duo? It’s getting there appeared first on xda-developers.
description: If you're looking to install Windows 11 on your Microsoft Surface Duo for some reason, you might be able to in the near future!
